//: Every spell that a monster casts are explained here. There's no way of telling you the description in-game, and here we are, reading infos about 'em at this file!

Since monsters can only have one spell in their special attacks (and idk if this is intentional to the devs), I tend to combine them... Combo (combination) spell and a regular one, casted in an instance!
name: Sacrifice
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster deals an instant death damage, sacrificing itself upon casting a spell that's been combined with.'

name: Summon Tentacles
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's tentacle outburst sprouts 3 tentacles out of the ground.'

name: Twisted Strike
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's tentacle outburst pierces the closest target from the caster with compact tentacles, dealing moderate stabbing damage and inflicts unconsciousness for 1 turn.'

name: Tentacle Outburst
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its body for some turns to strike the ground with its tentacles, then bursts violently under the target, dealing stabbing damage and applies an unstable footing that lasts for 3 turns to the affected creatures in its radius.'

name: Pin Missile
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster quickly sways its limb to shoot off needle-like projectiles in a cone, dealing stabbing damage to the targets.'

name: Charging Stance
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sets itself into guarding stance, blocking physical damage while gaining a burst of speed.'
//: 15 turns duration, to make titans not OP everytime.

name: a spell
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster locks its line of sight onto the target, then casts the combo spell(s).'

extra_effects.//: hit_self, so it forces the monster to cast the spell with 0 range value to itself, receiving (de)buff, damage or healing spell effect.

//: Add an effect to spell. Monster won't cast a spell if it doesn't do anything to the target.
As long as caster sees the target, it will cast (if its not on cooldown, ofc). Nice.

name: Acid Burst
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's acid glob explodes violently, dealing acid damage to all surrounding creatures.'

name: Acid Glob
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster shoots a mouthful of concentrated acid glob to the target, dealing a small acid damage.'

name: Summon Blood Vessel
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its hands to create a blood vessel.'

name: Summon 2 Blood Vessels
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its core to create 2 blood vessels.'

name: Summon 2 Blood Vessels
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's blood wave creates 2 blood vessels nearby.'

name: Summon Blood Fiend
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's blood wave creates a blood fiend nearby.'

name: Blood Curl
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'When the target is nearby, caster manipulates some of the blood wave's blood to stick into the target, applying bloodbath. This is casted 3 times.'

name: Blood Wave
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its surrounding blood to strike a large area in a cone, dealing moderate bash damage and applying bloodbath to the affected creatures.'

name: Summon Shadow
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's enshroud splits a small chunk of shadow next to the target.'

name: Enshroud
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the caster's target is nearby, the target is enveloped in shadows, dealing small true damage, blinding them and summons a shadow next to them.'

name: Summon Shadow
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's shadow splits a small chunk, creating an independent shadow.'

name: Lingering Shadow
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's ominous curse deals a light, continuous true damage to the target.'

name: Ominous Curse
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Target is afflicted by an ominous curse and is dealt with light true damage..'

name: Writhing Slash
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the caster's target is nearby after precision stab, the caster's tongue sweeps it sideways, dealing cutting damage and applies an unstable footing to the affected creatures. This is casted for 2 times.'

name: Precision Stab
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster reaches and quickly strikes the target with its hideous tongue, dealing moderate stabbing damage.'

name: Gas Burst
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the caster's target is upclose, caster sends a strong burst of acidic gas in a wide, yet short cone, dealing moderate acid damage to all affected creatures.'

name: Noxious Gas
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its body to produce an acidic gas and sends it to the target in a cone that deals lingering acid damage to all affected creatures.'

name: Lock On
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster glares at the target, inflicting disorienting impairments.'

name: Lock On
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster glares at the target, inflicting disorienting impairments.'

name: Lock On
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster glares at the target, inflicting disorienting impairments.'

name: Lock On
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster glares at the target, inflicting disorienting impairments.'

name: Vein Explosion
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'The torn up ligament explodes internally, dealing an extra bio damage to the target.'

name: Volatile Scratch
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster scratches the target with a claw imbued in volatile bodily fluid, dealing moderate cutting damage that lingers for few turns.'

name: Pull Blood
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's blood suck pulls in the blood fields. This is casted for 3 times.'

name: Blood Suck
//: Even if there's no blood field nearby, it still heals...
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'More vine strands from the caster sweeps around the vicinity, collecting and sucking the blood fields in which heals the caster.'

name: Floral Bite
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'When upclose, caster crunches at the target, dealing extra moderate cutting damage.'

name: Vine Slash
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster strikes the target from afar with its sharpest, whip-like vine, dealing cutting damage.'

name: Summon 4 Nautilus Torpedos
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'After casting sewave, caster creates 4 nautilus torpedos.'

name: Sewave
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster submerges into the water and generates a seismic wave in a very large cone, dealing cold damage and applying unstable footing to the affected creatures.'

name: Restraint
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster latches itself, reducing the agility of the target.'

name: Lacerate
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the target is nearby, caster slashes with a vine, dealing moderate cutting damage. This is casted 2 times.'

name: Razor Leaf
description:
(Combo) spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sends its sharp leaves to mince the targets in a line, dealing moderate cutting damage.'

name: Sweet Scent
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Floral bloom accompanies the wild outburst, spreading sleep-inducing pollens in the same area.'

name: Wild Outgrowth
description:
(Combo) spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its body to create an outburst of twisted roots and vines under the target, dealing moderate stabbing damage and ensnares the affected creatures.'

name: Summon 2 Triffids
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its hand to create and send forth 2 triffids, along with the wild outgrowth.'

name: Acid Touch
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'When upclose, caster then scratches the target with its excess blood, dealing acid damage.'

name: Acid Coat
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its hands to extract a large amount of acidic fluid from its body, then sends it to the target in a short but wide line, dealing moderate acid damage that lingers overtime.'

name: Sweepidic
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the target is nearby, caster sweeps some of the excess fluids in a small cone, dealing small damage to all creatures.'

name: Acid Rain
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its whole body for a very long time to produce an extremely vast amount of corrosive bodily fluids and sends it up above the target then explode, dealing tremendous acid damage to all creatures in the vicinity, which lingers within time.'

name: Portal
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'A multi-dimensional portal is made from the collapse. This portal leads the carrion race into the world.'

name: Gravitational Collapse
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'After channeling for a massive amount of time, caster's gravitational force field collapses, creating a supernova, dealing tremendous bash damage to all creatures. Sparkling objects are scattered, which enlightens the area.'
//: Basically, an enemy target has to be the center of explosion, so that combo spells get casted successfully.

name: Portal
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'A multi-dimensional portal is made from the collapse. This portal leads the vector race into the world.'

name: Gravitational Collapse

'After channeling for a massive amount of time, caster's gravitational force field collapses, creating a supernova, dealing tremendous bash damage to all creatures. Sparkling objects are scattered, which enlightens the area.'

name: Vectorize
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'A wave of vector dust spreads from the caster, converting nearby organic terrains such as grass and bushes to become infected.'

description:

description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster leaps onto the target's feet, harming their overall mobility.'

name: Shadow Push
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster pushes the targets with its shadows.'

name: Shadow Burst
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sends out a wave of shadow, dealing moderate bashing damage, applying unstable footing and knocks them back.'

name: Sinister Strike
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster produces a compact shadow, forming a silhouette with its claws imbued in shadows then strikes the target, dealing moderate cutting damage and applying blindness.'

name: Nocturnal Sweep
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster nimbly slashes through the vicinity, dealing moderate cutting damage to the surrounding creatures.'

name: Shadow Pull
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its body to send forth errant shadows to the targets then pulls them in.'

//: Combo: pull foes x aoe (aoe is 5) -> circular attack -> ranged attack -> push foes x aoe. Pulling the player doesn't work, but affects other creatures... slightly and buggy.

name: Wide Slash

Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:

name: Deceitful Slash
description:
Combo spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster confounds the target with a fake slash, followed with a powerful swing to the weakpoint, dealing tremendous cutting damage and inflicts unconsciousness for 2 turns. If the target is a player or an NPC, the slash hits a random limb.'
